display_long_description:
Welcome to the CapCap Revolutions, the uprising you never saw coming! You are a capuchin monkey with a magnificent plan: to liberate your fellow primates from the tyranny of boring cages and steal all the shiny things. Your adventure begins in the tranquil Forest, your training ground for the acrobatic mayhem to come.

Master your parkour skills as you navigate the lush canopy, then gear up for your mission in the quirky Shop map. This is your arsenal, a treasure trove of the absurd. Trade your hard-stolen coins for jetpacks, banana-powered slingshots, and other essential revolutionary equipment.

But the world is vast and full of challenges. Feel your tiny fingers go numb as you traverse the treacherous, platform-heavy Icy map, where one wrong jump means a frozen plunge. Then, soak up the sun (and maybe a few cocktails) on the vibrant Beach map, a deceptively relaxing zone with its own aquatic perils and puzzles.

Yet, your quest for ultimate freedom takes a dark turn. Rumors speak of a forgotten laboratory where your kind were experimented on. The two-part Horror level awaits. Abandon all whimsy as you descend into a chilling, atmospheric nightmare. Use your agility not for thievery, but for survival, evading the lingering horrors that stalk the flickering hallways. Can you uncover the dark truth behind the experiments and escape with your sanity intact?

CapCap Revolutions is a wild blend of hilarious monkey mischief and genuine, heart-pounding terror. 100% not AI.
